channel.title: R Bloggers on Michael W. Kearney
channel.description: Recent content in R Bloggers on Michael W. Kearney

item.title: Calling out R-bloggers in my R-bloggers post
item.description: Allow me to preface this post by saying I’m a big fan of R-bloggers, a content aggregating site focused on blog posts about R. It serves a useful purpose1 and has considerable reach.2 So although what follows may seem combative, I honestly hope R-bloggers continues to operate and inspire people to use R and share their R-related ideas and tips for many years to come. With that said, in this post I argue that R-bloggers should be better than it currently is.
